mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_user a
JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = a.id AND ur.role_id = #{role.id}
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND (c.id = #{company.id} OR c.parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{company.id}||',%') CONCAT('%,', #{company.id}, ',%'))
AND (o.id = #{office.id} OR o.parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{office.id}||',%') CONCAT('%,', #{office.id}, ',%'))
AND a.id != '1'
AND a.login_name like '%'||#{loginName}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{loginName}, '%')
AND a.name like '%'||#{name}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
${sqlMap.dsf}
ORDER BY ${page.orderByField} ASC
ORDER BY ${page.orderByField} DESC
ORDER BY c.code, o.code, a.name
